snippet.title: Video Game Review: Flight Simulator X
snippet.description: The latest Flight Simulator game is the best yet.

snippet.title: Museum of Flight
snippet.description: Aviation fanatics of all ages will be in heaven at the Museum of Flight. Teens will love the six flight simulators (especially the Top Gun simulator), plus over 50 mint...

snippet.title: San Diego Air and Space Museum
snippet.description: The San Diego Air and Space Museum is awesome even if you hate to fly. Staffed mostly by incredibly knowledgeable and helpful retired pilots, the museum has flight simulators, lots...

snippet.title: National Air and Space Museum
snippet.description: Little astronauts, engineers, and aspiring pilots will be fascinated by checking out full-size, original planes and space ships up close, and those enamored by the starry nighttime skies will love delving deep into inte...

snippet.title: WonderWorks
snippet.description: If you want to add a dash of 'mad science' to your vacation, this is your stop. There's no mistaking that there's something unusual about this place -- especially since the...

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Sid Meier's RailRoads!
snippet.description: All aboard for this railroad strategy game.

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Blazing Angels: Squadrons of WWII
snippet.description: War aerial simulation hovers near average.

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Ace Combat 6: Fires of Liberation
snippet.description: Intense aerial combat game with great visuals.

snippet.title: Television Review: Dogfights
snippet.description: Military docu looks at tactics, not consequences.

snippet.title: Video Game Review: Battlefield Vietnam
snippet.description: Better than many shooters, but still very violent.
